meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by dropsy.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a hydropic condition.
meanings.sent2: Her hydropic symptoms included swelling and bloating.
meanings.sent3: The hydropic teddy bear looked like it had too much water to drink.
meanings.sent4: The hydropic clouds in the sky threatened a heavy downpour.
meanings.sent5: The hydropic plant wilted under the weight of excess water.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or pertaining to an abnormal accumulation of fluid in tissues or cavities of the body.
meanings.sent1: The hydropic tissues in his leg caused discomfort and pain.
meanings.sent2: The hydropic swelling in her ankle required medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The hydropic balloon popped when it couldn't hold any more water.
meanings.sent4: The hydropic river overflowed its banks after heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The hydropic jar leaked water, creating a mess on the table.
